argument.name: status
argument.description: The status message. If status is a boolean value of "false" then status will be hidden, if "true" then the currently active tools status message will be shown. If status is a string then the message will be picked from the A5.Ink.status.messages object. If status is an object, then a property with the name "html" will be expected.

argument.name: html
argument.description: The HTML to display in the status message area.
